results.name: a(n) = denominator of squared radius R^2 of the circumcircle of the n-th triangle with integer sides i <= j <= k in a list of such triangles, the list being sorted by increasing size of R. Numerators are A331227.
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Jan 12 2020
